unnormalised: Hey folks, ever think about where your daily garbage ends up? Well, waste management is getting a serious makeover in Mumbai! The Brihanmumbai Municipal Corporation (BMC) is rolling out a new initiative focusing on source segregation – basically, separating your wet and dry waste at home. Remember that dialogue from *Lagaan*, “Goli nahi, kachra uthao”? Turns out, that's the mantra for a cleaner Bharat too!
